name: PewResearchCenterFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Pew Research Center Flash Briefing brings you non-partisan, non-advocacy updates each weekday on the issues, attitudes and trends shaping the world. Topics range from U.S. politics, migration, American daily life, global attitudes, journalism and media, internet, science and technology, and religion and public life.

Enable this flash briefing and move it to the top of your news brief by going to “Settings” in the Alexa app.

Say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest. And visit us on pewresearch.org for in-depth analysis.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
